battleships.tests package#

Submodules#

battleships.tests.test_components module#

Module for testing the components used in the game Battleships

battleships.tests.test_components.test_create_battleships(filename, expected_exception)#

Tests create_battleships with a range of different inputs

battleships.tests.test_components.test_create_battleships_output()#

Test to verify the output of create_battleships is a dictionary where the keys are strings and the values are integers without giving an argument (default filename = battleships.txt)

battleships.tests.test_components.test_initialise_board(size, expected_exception)#

Tests initialise_board with a range of different inputs

battleships.tests.test_components.test_initialise_board_output()#

Test to verify the output of initialise_board is a list of lists of None values without giving an argument (default size = 10)

battleships.tests.test_components.test_place_battleships_algorithm(algorithm, expected_exception)#

Tests place_battleships with a range of different inputs

battleships.tests.test_components.test_place_battleships_board(board, expected_exception)#

Tests place_battleships with a range of different inputs

battleships.tests.test_components.test_place_battleships_output()#

Test to verify the output of place_battleships is a list of lists which contains string values when given 2 arguments (ideal_board, ideal_ships)

battleships.tests.test_components.test_place_battleships_ships(board, battleships, expected_exception)#

Tests place_battleships with a range of different inputs

battleships.tests.test_functionality module#

battleships.tests.test_functionality.test_attack_return()#

Test if the attack function returns a boolean value corresponding to whether the attack was a hit or miss.

battleships.tests.test_functionality.test_create_battleships_return()#

Test if the create_battleships function returns a dictionary consisting of keys of type string and values of type integer when no arguments are given.

battleships.tests.test_functionality.test_generate_attack_return()#

Test if the generate_attack function returns a tuple of 2 integers within the range of the board both given and not given an argument of size (default = 10).

battleships.tests.test_functionality.test_initialise_board_return_size()#

Test if the initialise_board function returns a list of the correct size.

battleships.tests.test_functionality.test_place_battleships_return_custom()#

Test if the place_battleships function returns a list of lists consisting of None and strings when given a board, battleships dictionary and a placement.json file using the custom placement algorithm.

battleships.tests.test_functionality.test_place_battleships_return_random()#

Test if the place_battleships function returns a list of lists consisting of None and strings when given a board and battleships dictionary using the random placement algorithm.

battleships.tests.test_functionality.test_place_battleships_return_simple()#

Test if the place_battleships function returns a list of lists consisting of None and strings when given a board and battleships dictionary using the simple placement algorithm.

battleships.tests.test_helper_functions module#

class battleships.tests.test_helper_functions.TestReport(filename)#

Bases: object

add_message(message)#
battleships.tests.test_helper_functions.is_dict_of_type(obj, key_type, value_type)#

Used to test if an object is a dictionary of a certain type

battleships.tests.test_helper_functions.is_list_of_lists(obj, subtype)#

Used to test if an object is a list of lists of a certain type

battleships.tests.test_helper_functions.tuple_of_type(obj, type1, type2)#

Used to test if an object is a tuple of a certain type

Test if the ai_opponent_game_loop function exists.
